results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-7fb9f56bfb-hd9d2 Pod/wordpress-deployment-7fb9f56bfb-wndv2 Pod/wordpress-deployment-7fb9f56bfb-49nsh], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints; the listed pods are not ready, though 3 are expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`.
3. Verify readiness probes in pod specs.
4. Ensure network policies allow traffic.
5. Restart pods if needed.

results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-7fb9f56bfb-49nsh

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
